name: Heart to Heart
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You connect your spirit to the target creature's spirit and start a conversation shared only between the two of you. The conversation lasts for what feels like 1 minute, though only two seconds pass outside of the spell. No other creature can use telepathy or magic to know what is being communicated.

You and the creature always understand each other when speaking in this way. The creature is not obligated to speak to you, though it must always hear what you are saying.
